laws.suggestion: Modify the non-compete clause to include specific reasonable limitations, such as: "The employee agrees not to engage in competing activities within the state of Utah for a period of one year following termination of employment, limited to the specific job duties and geographic area of their employment with the company.

laws.suggestion: Remove salary history questions. Replace with: 'Please provide your salary expectations for this role, as Utah law prohibits requesting or relying on prior salary history in determining compensation.
